data.title: List of American films of 1985
data.text:
This is a list of American films released in 1985.

The highest-grossing American films released in 1985, by domestic box office gross revenue, are as follows:[1]

Highest-grossing films of 1985 Rank Title Distributor Domestic gross 1 Back to the Future Universal $210,609,762 2 Rambo: First Blood Part II TriStar / Carolco $150,415,432 3 Rocky IV MGM $127,873,716 4 The Color Purple Warner Bros. $94,175,854 5 Out of Africa Universal $87,071,205 6 Cocoon 20th Century Fox $76,113,124 7 The Jewel of the Nile $75,973,200 8 Witness Paramount $68,706,993 9 The Goonies Warner Bros. $61,389,680 10 Spies Like Us $60,088,980
